translations: 修补者；[计] 复位器；[计] 恢复设备；修建者

sentences.sentence: The restorer function, when called, puts the original handlers (if any) right back where they were.
sentences.translation: 调用这个还原器函数时，它会将原始的处理程序放回原处。

sentences.sentence: Carriage restorer Dave Evans cleans the Glass Coach at the Royal Mews in central London on March 21.
sentences.translation: 3月21日，伦敦，马车修缮师戴维·埃文斯在伦敦中心清理皇家马车的玻璃车厢。

sentences.sentence: The author of the project has several professions, one of them is the restorer of monumental painting.
sentences.translation: 本项目的创作者有几种职业，其中一种是纪念性画作的修复者。
